subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Bill Belichick may not be any more of a football “genius” than Bill Walsh, Tom Landry or Don Shula. But he is the genius for this moment, for this time.
snippet: Bill Belichick may not be any more of a football “genius” than Bill Walsh, Tom Landry or Don Shula. But he is the genius for this moment, for this time.
